channel.title: SpecRamPaGE ~PlayWithStyleLikeNeverBefore [Need Website Developer + Java Coders]
channel.description:
Hi,
I'm Proud & Pleased to announce the realeasing of SpecRamPaGE 'The Future Best Server' as you all know this project was first started by me (Mohd), I'm currently looking for Mature,Skilled,Talented,Professional Person. "Think about it seriously,and I did thought about it, I'm never going to give up i'll still improve and improve!" I'm currently the main thing I'm looking for is a WebDeveloper/Designer (PHP,HTML,CSS). I will Create/Invent the smartest ever plan staff development organization ever alive,there will be alot of secret methods That are HIDDEN for a great succesfull server. also,there might be a decision/disscussion about making not a "main owner" but community managment leader/organizer which means like the top. so no hard feelings may occur. I'm going to mention our developers
Founder/Organizer/CoderOfClient&Souce/GFX - Mohd
Other(Not Website developing): - Munk ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ NEEDED:
WebMaster,Developer,designer:
-
Videographers: - -
Java Coders - MOHD - EMPTY - EMPTY
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- MEDIA: COMMING SOON ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Application:
Applying for?: Why should we choose you?: Will you stay dedicated?: Age: Do you think you can get along with other staff?: How many hours a day are you usually on?: Facebook/msn? If yes, put your name please: Years with Java: Java knowledge?(1/10): Proof of any work?: additional comments:
Name: Age: Html, PHP, MYSql Experience 1/10: Time Using Html, PHP, MYSql: Msn/Other contact information: Previous Work: ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Also I'm I'm going to give a quick Brief of the server:
- Duel arena/Staking
- Full dungeoneering
- Full summoning
- Great Eco & Stability
- 634+ Items & 525 Gfx
- Active PKing & Community.
---------------------------------------------------------- Clearing OUT it in an other way:
Hello everyone, I currently own a RuneScape Private Server, however I need some of the best website developers out there. I need php, HTML, css, and javascript coders for my website. We will start the website form scratch. I'm offering staff in-game and on the website for rewards of good job. The format to apply will be:
Name: Age: Country: Position you are interested in: Experience: Hours Available to work each day/weekend/week: Pictures of your work: Skype/MSN:
Thank you, Mohd.

item.title: SpecRamPaGE ~PlayWithStyleLikeNeverBefore [Need Website Developer + Java Coders]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

This is one of the most hated developments I’ve seen in a while…

OT: Well… people are right about one thing, you’re going to receive a lot of hate because of what was stated in the topic about this being the best and what not, no one will know for sure unless we see some media, be prepared mate.

I would also reconstruct this entire development because it’s so uneat mate, this is a big thing about appealing threads and what people like, I would suggest doing this now.

Read full topic

Good luck with this though I suppose.[/quote] I don’t Understand why people are stupid like this,first of all i set a goal of ‘The Future best server’ is set a goal to me,that is showing that i will never giveup,or still improve.
